Summary: Multi star pattern coming from east. staying in unchanging formation. stopped
divs: sighting detailsoften, when the sky is clear, i look out bedroom window briefly before sleeping. this past tue. at 11pm i looked out at a pretty clear sky and, after a min., saw a star pattern in the distant east that incl. 3 stars in a perfect line. as i continued to watch, i realized that the pattern of 9 stars (later aware of two smaller sattelites) was slowly moving straight across the sky toward me. i thought, wow, i'm finally seeing something. i noticed that the pattern was not moving in a normal rotational direction as all other stars do. it came in a straight line, slowly and never changing formation. i quickly got my binocs.(7x35\8*)and after 30-35 min. i thought it was going to pass out of sight over my roof but it stopped just short of the roof overhang. i noticed that in addition to the 9 primary stars, there were 2 smaller, less bright sattelites that could only be seen with the binocs. during the next 25-30 min. saw the usual stars rotate towards the south but the pattern sat still. during the 1\2 hr. or so the pattern very slowly eked west (prob.rotation related). a little ways s.e. of me are the fermi towers and i wondered if this ufo's observance had anything to do with them, hoping not. at about midnight, with nothing else happening, i went to bed. the following day i looked around the web, hoping to see some confirmation, but nothing. they were basically the same brightness as any star (way,way up there) and moving slowly so i understand why they weren't obvious. i wish i could show you the pattern because it included 2 perfect rows of 3 and a perfect triangle on the right end. none of this surprises me, because of my reading for the last 4 1\2 yrs. but it was a trip because it was the first sighting for me!
